reviews.review_msg: I'd like to extend my heartfelt applause and deepest gratitude to Professor Rodney Vaughan. His exceptional guidance and unwavering support were instrumental in the successful completion of my PhD. Professor Vaughan's profound knowledge and dedication to his students make him an outstanding educator and mentor. Thank you, Professor Vaughan.

Knowledgeable professor with good helping nature. Used to share experiences from her past, so they gave break from lecture heavy classes, unfortunately stopped it due to feedback. Except the basic concepts in networking, its useless as Project requires research-oriented tools Riverbed or NS wont help in job interview. NS3 is hard for non-programmer
Course material is invaluable!  The project portion is awesome!
She is one of the worst profs ever. Always confused when teaching. She might be better than Craig, but it doesn't count, anyone does better than Craig. she might be good for a high school course.
